ABOUT.TITLE: THE COMPANY
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION:
We are a Portuguese company founded in 2002 in Vila do Conde and we take pride in combining evolution with tradition. We strive every day to build strong and trustworthy relationships with our customers and suppliers.

Our quality extends to all materials and manufacturing processes we use. Our products are fully customizable and we design based on our customers' needs.

GOOD_DESIGN.TITLE: GOOD DESIGN IS A GOOD PROCESS
GOOD_DESIGN.DESCRIPTION: Each project receives careful attention. The quality and durability of materials used in each piece combines with the reliability of industrial processes and the dedication of handcrafted work. Everyone involved in the production of our items has extensive experience, and their skilled hands ensure attention to every detail, even the least visible ones.

PRODUCTS.TITLE: Find the ideal solution for your space, with quality and elegance

TALK_TO_US.TITLE: Custom Quote for Exclusive Wood Projects
TALK_TO_US.DESCRIPTION: We are specialists in custom woodworking. Contact us and get a no-obligation quote for your dream project.

FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: We offer high-quality carpentry solutions, combining creativity and precision to ensure customer satisfaction in every project.
FOOTER.ADDRESS: Rua da Aldeia Nova, Warehouse 141J, Vila do Conde
FOOTER.COPYRIGHT: © 2024 Nuno Cardoso Carpintaria. All rights reserved.

COOKIES.MESSAGE: This website uses cookies to improve your experience. By continuing to browse, you agree to the use of cookies.

INTRO.TITLE: Introduction
INTRO.CONTENT: Nuno Cardoso - Carpintaria ('we', 'us', or 'our') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use our website.

CONTROLLER.TITLE: Data Controller
CONTROLLER.CONTENT: The data controller responsible for your personal data is:
CONTROLLER.ADDRESS: Rua da Aldeia Nova, Warehouse 141J, Portugal

DATA_COLLECTION.TITLE: Information We Collect
DATA_COLLECTION.DESCRIPTION: We collect and process the following types of information:

TYPES.TECHNICAL: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)
TYPES.USAGE: Usage data (how you use our website)

LEGAL_BASIS.TITLE: Legal Basis for Processing
LEGAL_BASIS.CONSENT: Your consent for non-essential cookies and analytics
LEGAL_BASIS.CONTRACT: Performance of a contract when you request our services
LEGAL_BASIS.LEGITIMATE_INTERESTS: Our legitimate interests to improve our services

COOKIES.TITLE: Cookies and Similar Technologies
COOKIES.DESCRIPTION: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience:

ESSENTIAL.TITLE: Essential Cookies
ESSENTIAL.DESCRIPTION: Required for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled.

ANALYTICS.TITLE: Analytics Cookies
ANALYTICS.DESCRIPTION: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website

DATA_RETENTION.TITLE: Data Retention
DATA_RETENTION.DESCRIPTION: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.

DATA_TRANSFERS.TITLE: International Data Transfers
DATA_TRANSFERS.DESCRIPTION: Your data is stored and processed within the European Economic Area (EEA). Any transfers outside the EEA will be protected by appropriate safeguards.

RIGHTS.TITLE: Your Rights
RIGHTS.ACCESS: Right to access your personal data
RIGHTS.DELETION: Right to request deletion of your data
RIGHTS.WITHDRAW_CONSENT: Right to withdraw consent at any time

COMPLAINTS.TITLE: Complaints
COMPLAINTS.CONTENT: If you have concerns about how we handle your data, please contact us first. You also have the right to complain to a supervisory authority.
COMPLAINTS.AUTHORITY: In Portugal, you can contact the National Data Protection Commission (CNPD).

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.CONTENT: For any privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, please contact us at nunocardoso.carpintaria@gmail.com
